Text:
THIS IS A RE-UPLOAD, as my previous torrent (with the same name) had incorrect file names.

For those of you who uploaded the previous (now deleted) torrent, the following files need to be renamed:

2x02 is actually 2x05
2x03 is actually 2x02
2x04 is actually 2x03
2x05 is actually 2x04

Thank you for your patience, and sorry for the inconvenience.
Thank you! I have been searching for this all over! Is there English subs?

English Subtitles are In Progress: http://crisabel.jumpwiki.com/wiki/Translations
Check there frequently for updates.
You should upload a torrent with the subtitle files inside. :D But thank you -- this will help new people discover this show. Best lesbian storyline I've ever seen. Not even joking.
